channel.title: Corporate Business on Henli | Energy
channel.description: Recent content in Corporate Business on Henli | Energy

item.title: Company Launches Aggressive Overseas Market Strategy
item.description: After solidifying its leadership in China’s new energy power lithium battery market, the company has officially launched its overseas expansion strategy. Leveraging strong technical capabilities, exceptional product quality, and large-scale manufacturing advantages, we’re confidently bringing safe, efficient, and reliable lithium solutions to the global stage, actively participating in the worldwide green energy transition.
